19 #ifndef __G_CHARSET_H__
20 #define __G_CHARSET_H__
21 
22 #if !defined (__GLIB_H_INSIDE__) && !defined (GLIB_COMPILATION)
23 #error "Only <glib.h> can be included directly."
24 #endif
25 
26 #include <glib/gtypes.h>
27 
28 G_BEGIN_DECLS
29 
30 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
31 gboolean              g_get_charset         (const char **charset);
32 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
33 gchar *               g_get_codeset         (void);
34 
35 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
36 const gchar * const * g_get_language_names  (void);
37 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_2_58
38 const gchar * const * g_get_language_names_with_category
39                                             (const gchar *category_name);
40 GLIB_AVAILABLE_IN_ALL
41 gchar **              g_get_locale_variants (const gchar *locale);
42 
43 G_END_DECLS
44 
45 #endif  /* __G_CHARSET_H__ */
